body: Each of these animal companions has a different starting speed, attacks, ability scores, and special qualities. As you gain levels, your companion grows in power as well. It gains the same bonuses that are gained by other animal companions . Each companion gains an additional bonus, usually at 4th or 7th level, as listed with each choice. A kobold cavalier can select either of these companions as a mount instead of a dog or pony.
